General.Name: Metals Acquisition Limited
General.Description: MAC Copper Limited focuses on operating and acquiring metals and mining businesses in Australia. It operates the Cornish, Scottish and Australian underground copper mine in Cobar, Australia. The company was formerly known as Metals Acquisition Limited and changed its name to MAC Copper Limited in December 2024. MAC Copper Limited was incorporated in 2022 and is headquartered in Saint Helier, Jersey.
